Posts.Content: I totally feel everyones pain. I have been on anastrozole now for 7 months. I gel like an old lady. When I stand up from sitting or laying down i feel l like an old lady. But in the last 2 months I have been suffering from swollen feet and ankles. I can't even wear heels anymore. I see my oncologist this week. Something I will discuss with her. I mean is better than having my cancer return. But still, not sure how iwill fare with 4 more years of this.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: On Jan 04, 2015 3:58 AM rpoole1962 wrote: Hello,  I have been on Arimidex for 5 weeks with no side effects.  I have the occasional hot flash but not anything like how it was on Tamoxifin.  I was cancer free for 3 1/2 years on Tamoxifin but had a reoccurance.  Onc put me on Arimidex and I have heard all the bad side effects, but none for me after 5 weeks.  I'm so scared it is not working.  And I have to wait 2 more months to find out!!  This crap could be spreading and growing.  Isn't there a test to send off tumor to see what works and what doesn't?  I don't like trial and error method. Thanks for any input. Robin I've been on arimidex now for 7 months. The first few months no bad side effects.  Now my joints and bones hurt. My feet, knees and hands hurt all the time.  Mainly when I'm in one position for more than 30 minutes. This includes sleeping. Will discuse with my onco tomorrow. Ughh. Hang in there..I hope u don't have any more than what u have now. Good luck.
Posts.Title: Arimidex..may not be working
